item.title: Compilation of Q&A on Basic Economics part One
item.description: Pdf version with equations in a correct form ## 2 questions on the “Exercise 2 : Cobb-Douglas Production Function” : i don’t get the answer the question 3 in this exercise when the power of \(x^0.5\) is changed to \(x−0.5\) The output elasticity with respect to \(x_2\) is defined as a ratio of marginal product and average product. We can write marg.product as: \[mP_{x_2} = \frac{\bar{x}_1^{0.
